sentences.en: Asked what she meant, she said mysteriously: "Work it out for yourself".
sentences.cn: 问她是什么意思，她故弄玄虚地说：“你自己想吧。”

sentences.en: Do you notice how mysteriously the colors behave here?
sentences.cn: 你注意到这些色彩的情调在这里显得如何神秘 吗 ?
烟雾茫茫的群山有着神秘的魅力.

sentences.en: He vanished mysteriously after the close of business on Saturday night.
sentences.cn: 星期六晚上停止营业后他神秘地失踪了.

sentences.en: Inside the market covered with strange atmosphere, the streets were mysteriously whisper.
sentences.cn: 交易市场里面满布着诡异的气氛, 满街的人神秘地交头接耳.

sentences.en: My car had mysteriously stalled, and I was stranded and alone.
sentences.cn: 那时,车子莫名其妙地熄火了, 我只身被困在林中.
我的手表不知怎么就不见了。

sentences.en: Old beams began to crack mysteriously.
sentences.cn: 那些老屋的屋梁也神秘地发出裂开似的声响.

sentences.en: She smiled mysteriously when I asked her about my birthday present.
sentences.cn: 当我问她有关我生日礼物时,她神秘地微笑了.
她沉默不语，神秘地笑着。

sentences.en: Shortly before Christmas, he was mysteriously taken ill.
sentences.cn: 圣诞节前不久，他突然不明原因地病倒了。

sentences.en: So what can we do to get more of this marvelous, mysteriously restorative sleep stage?
sentences.cn: 那么，我们能做些什么才能恢复这个奇妙而神秘的恢复性睡眠阶段？

sentences.en: The animal was heavier than Gerard had expected, shifting its weight mysteriously from one corner of the box to another as he carried it out into the snow and set it on the seat beside him.
sentences.cn: 这个动物要比杰拉德想象的要重些，当勃兹曼顶着雪走出来并把它放在杰拉德座位旁边时，箱子里动物的重量神秘的从箱子的一角偏向另一角。

sentences.en: The bas - reliefs around the base of the Borobudur were mysteriously - covered by stone walls.
sentences.cn: 婆罗 浮屠 基础周围的半浮雕神秘地被石墙所掩盖.

sentences.en: The lights mysteriously failed, and we stumbled around in complete darkness.
sentences.cn: 灯不知怎么地不亮了，我们在一片黑暗中跌跌撞撞地走着。

sentences.en: The plane crashed mysteriously near the island of Ustica.
sentences.cn: 那架飞机在乌斯蒂卡岛附近神秘坠毁了。

sentences.en: The soup was thin and clear, yet mysteriously rich.
sentences.cn: 汤又稀又清，味道却出奇地浓。

sentences.en: They had mysteriously found their way there from the wine cellar!
sentences.cn: 这些酒瓶神不知鬼不觉地从酒窖来到了这里.

sentences.en: To chime the notes of his emotion, a verse mysteriously entered the correspondent's head.
sentences.cn: 为拨动思绪, 记者的脑海里莫名其妙地浮现出一首诗.

words.tran_cn: 神秘的；不可思议的；难解的
神秘，秘密；奥秘；神秘的事物
神秘化；困惑不解；骗人的把戏
使神秘化；使迷惑，使困惑
神秘地；故弄玄虚地；难以理解地

trans.tran_cn: 神秘地，不可思议地，诡秘地，故弄玄虚地
